Name: Glare Sash
LongDescription: Absorbs damage from Ground-type moves to restore HP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Shinx, Luxio, and Luxray.  You can get a Glare Sash at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Luxray Claw, a Luxray Fang, and a Glare Tag. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
